name: Colour Runner
description:
This game was created in the UCLAN Game Jam 2021,  Tasked with a one button game, we made a game based on colour matching. 

Space Bar changes the robots colours and its up to you to match the correct sequences in order to progress. The score resets upon death so those who want the highest score must make it through the entire level in one go.
